entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Terrace Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:59 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Terrace Bay 11:00 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023
Temperature: -7.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 56 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -14.4°C
Wind: 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then 40 percent chance of flurries after midnight. Snow beginning overnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to periods of light snow or drizzle in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm except locally 15 cm over higher terrain. Wind east 20 km/h becoming southeast 40 gusting to 60 in the morning then south 20 in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow or drizzle ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. High zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023
